A

AbstractHolePStrategy - Class in net.tomp2p.holep.strategy
DO NOT INSTANTIATE THIS CLASS!

If you need to add a new supported nat type please extend this class and change also NATType and NATTypeDetection.
AbstractHolePStrategy(Peer, int, int, Message) - Constructor for class net.tomp2p.holep.strategy.AbstractHolePStrategy
This constructor should never be called by the user, since it should be called by its strategy pattern instances like PortPreservingStrategy.
activeClients() - Method in class net.tomp2p.relay.DistributedRelay
Returns connections to current relay peers
